H0.text: Observing live organisms is best achieved when using a microscope with a wet mount.

H1.text: Show the interior of sliced objects is the purpose of using a wet mount when using a microscope.

H2.text: Highlight objects with chemical dyes is best achieved using a wet mount when using a microscope.

H3.text: Removing debris that is obscuring the object is best achieved by using a wet mount when using a microscope.

A4.text: Wet mounts are used to view live organisms and can be made using water and certain stains.

A5.text: The liquid is added to the slide before the addition of the organism and a coverslip is placed over the specimen in the water and stain to help contain it within the field of view.
